column1: Mike always puts the best interests of Northeast Wisconsin first. He has helped lead our local response to COVID-19 securing PPE for our front-line workers and first responders.   Watch his latest ad here: https://t.co/q0kL3vpT1q https://t.co/02AfcCmX1J

Defeating COVID-19 is going to require everyone coming together and doing their part. I was honored to join @FeedAmericaWI in Green Bay this morning at the Farm to Family Drive-Up Food Distribution. https://t.co/FIHfSjTYcM

From defending our freedoms as a member of the U.S. Marine Corps to helping Northeast Wisconsin overcome the challenges of COVID-19 Mike Gallagher has always fought for the “Greater Good.”   Check out his latest ad here: https://t.co/CpxLInr2Jw

Check out Mike's latest ad ‘Changes’ which highlights his efforts to:    🚑 Meet the challenges of COVID-19 head on.   🇺🇸 Help WI veterans re-acclimate to civilian life.  ⛴ Bring good-paying jobs to Northeast WI. https://t.co/U6i41qXzYN
